Oh, and invest in some condoms. Don't force the issue on the first date, but be ready when she's receptive, because it may come sooner than you think.

You watch them both on and off for the rest of the period. Billy has an interesting look on his face, and you catch Veronica looking at Billy speculatively a couple of times. You decide that match-making is amusing.

At lunch, you happen to catch sight of June's lab partner, Olivia Graziano. You will her over to your table, and reflect that she's pretty cute and you've always wondered what it would be like to have a "nooner." You wolf down your lunch while feeding arousal into her mind. You lead her out of the cafeteria and lead her to the supply room, which you happen to know is never kept locked, even though it's supposed to be. Once you've closed the door behind you, you put a finger to your lips as you start to undress, even as you command her to do likewise. You're extremely excited by this time, so you quickly take her in your arms and go at it. You're pressed for time, so it's all pretty down and dirty. You get the impression that it's not Olivia's first time, but you decide not to quiz her about it. When it's done, you both dress quickly and, checking that the coast is clear, leave the supply room. She heads back to class. You stop at the boy's room briefly, and then head to your next class yourself.


After school, you head over to June's house. As you expected, she isn't there yet. She'd said she might have to stay for a little while with some Science Club stuff. When you get there, Mrs. Terada lets you in. You sit in the kitchen doing your homework, while she putters around preparing supper. You take a closer look at her. She's pretty good-looking for a woman in her early 40's. It gives you hope that June will still look good when she's that age. An idea begins to form in your brain. You mentally command her to strip. You like what you see. No, she's not a kid anymore, but she's quite well put together. You set your homework aside and summon her over to sit in your lap and cuddle. You're sitting there idly fondling her breasts when June comes home.

"We're in the kitchen", you say. She comes into the room and smirks at what she sees.

"Bored, were you?"

"Not at all," you say. "Your mother is a most attentive hostess." At your command, June follows you and Mrs. Terada up to her mother's room, undressing all the while. The three of you climb into bed together. You're a little uncertain about the mechanics of a threesome, but Mrs. Terada has a surprising amount of knowledge on the subject, and the three of you have a very good time together. Afterwards, the you all lie on the bed together. Catherine (It seems ridiculous to be formal and call her "Mrs. Terada" anymore after what just went on.) drifts off to sleep, and you turn to June and ask her what she wanted to talk about.

"I've been thinking about what you asked - about the best way to use your power to your advantage. I think that what you should do depends on what you want out of life. So, what is it you want out of life? Besides banging everything that moves, of course! Seriously, though, did you want to be rich and famous, or rule the world? Or, did you want a quiet, comfortable life?"

You think a little, and reply...
1151111.title: You'll go to see her

choices: Mentally order whoever it is to go away.
11511112.content:
You tell June that you need some time to think about it. You've never really given serious thought to what you wanted to do with your life, always just assuming that something would turn up. You realize now that can't go on like that forever. You stay with June and Catherine for supper, and then finish your homework while you're there with June's brain to pick for help. You kiss them both goodbye and head home. As you leave the Teradas' house, thinking about home, you notice something unusual. When think about home, you find you can vaguely sense the minds of your family members. You focus on your mom's mind. You can actually see through her eyes! You've never been able to do that, and certainly not at this distance. You focus harder, to see if you can control her behavior. You urge her to call your cellphone, and she does. Are your powers expanding? Maybe they get stronger through use, they way muscles do! You reach out around you mentally, and find you can detect all of the minds you've touched before - your family, the Teradas, Olivia, Gwen, Billy, Veronica, your classmates, even the woman at the drugstore, you can sense them all! You decide to try something. You reach out into Olivia's mind. She's at home, talking to her mother about school. You focus through Olivia's mind at her mother, whom you've never met. You command her to cluck like a chicken, and she does! You send her to seek out Olivia's father, and you find that you can do the same with him. You try the experiment again with Gwen Barton, June's other lab partner, and find that it works for her parents, as well. Your powers definitely seem to be growing - not only can you reach out over longer distances than before, you can use minds you've already contacted as "relays" of sorts. You reach back to June's mind and convey the information to her, and find that you've walked all the way home.

You scan the house to see what's going on. You see that Liz has company, her friend Bridget O'Halloran. Bridget is redhead who looks exactly like you would imagine if you were imagining a "pretty young Irish girl". You find that you are "up" for more action and so reach out for Bridget's mind to take control of it. You send Liz and Bridget commands to get them ready while you go to your room to put your books away. By the time you get to Liz's room, she and Bridget are on the bed, naked, and making out vigorously. You join them, and are soon in the middle - literally- of your second threesome of the day.

Thursday morning, you wake up early again. You feel rested, even though you got less sleep than usual. You think about your experiences of the previous day. The fun you had with June and Catherine got you to thinking about the one "taboo" you hadn't broken yet. You mentally summon your mother to your room. She's wearing a nightgown and nothing else. You command her to remove it. You've never let yourself think about it before but she looks very good to you. You take her in your arms and soon you have earned the epithet "motherfucker".

You head off for school, and for once you seek out Dane in homeroom. He's looking clearer-eyed and better-presented this morning, so perhaps your "intervention" helped him after all. You chat contentedly with June. You hear one or two of the girls speculating thar you and June are an "item", but this doesn't bother you. In math class, you note with amusement that Veronica is sneaking looks as Billy, and smile as she blushes and looks hurriedly away when Billy catches her looking. This time at lunch, it's Gwen's turn to go with you for your "nooner". She's inexperienced but eager, and you have a good time. You reflect that even for a teenaged boy who's been given the keys to the sexual candy shop, your sex drive seems to have gone into overdrive!


June is busy with science stuff, so after school you head home. For once, you are the first one home, so you bring in the mail from the mailbox. There's nothing for you, so you set it on the hall table, managing to knock over your mother's favorite vase in the process. You wince as it breaks into half a dozen pieces!


"Ack, no!", you say out loud. "That cannot be broken! That cannot be broken!" You feel a tingling in your head, and the vase blurs before your eyes. When you can see it clearly again, it is intact! Could you have done that? Are you gaining new powers? You decide to try an experiment. You go out into the kitchen, and take out one of your mother's everyday plates. No point risking her finest china if you're wrong. You drop it on the floor and watch as it shatters. You focus on it, and sure enough it blurs and re-assembles, as good as new.

At that moment, Michelle comes in, and you spend some "quality" time with her. Later, you summon Sharon (you find it easier to think of her as "Sharon" rather than "mom" when you're in bed together) for a late-night "snack". Afterwards she mentions to you that your father had been talking about going to open up the Cabin this weekend. "The Cabin" is what your family calls the small vacation home your family owns in the woods upstate by a lake. You don't usually go up there in the winter, so you keep the place shut up, usually from October through March, You smile as you get an idea. The Cabin - yes, that would be perfect. But it won't be your father opening up camp, you have some other guests to invite, instead. You reach out mentally to your prospective "guests", so they can be ready.

Friday morning you wake up with Sharon next to you. You'd wondered what it would be like to wake up with someone, and so you'd kept her with you, mentally sending your father off to bed alone. You take her gently in the early morning, and then go off to school.

At school, you speak to June about your new plate-repairing abilty. She can only guess that her experiment had awakened some latent potential power in your brain. You see Dane, and for the second day in a row, he seems to be clean and more coherent. You note that other people seem to notice a difference in him, too. At lunch, you go so far as to skip your "nooner", so as not to miss it when Billy asks Veronica out. Billy does not disappoint, as he marches determinedly up to Veronica, and without so much as a stammer, asks her if she wants to go out on Saturday. To the astonishment of all (except you) within earshot, she agrees, and Billy just as determinedly marches off. The news is soon all over the school, and you listen to the gossip with amusement. It ranges from speculation that she's lost her mind to speculation that she is playing a cruel gag on him. Many people admire Billy for finding the nerve to do it.

After school, Sharon arrives in her car with MIchelle to pick you up. Catheirne arrives and picks up June, Olivia and Gwen. Each of the girls has overnight bags. You head north, and are joined on the road by Liz in her old clunker. Bridget is riding with her. Dad and Butch are left at home alone for the weekend, but you're sure they will find a way to keep themselves busy. You arrive at the Cabin just before sundown, and with nine of you, opening it up and airing it out doesn't take much time. After a light supper, you command them all:


Let the orgy begin!

You indulge yourself as best you can, and when you can't , you amuse yourself by pairing off the others in various combinations. The nine of you all but pass out from exhaustion around midnight and fall asleep where you lie. In the morning, after a quick breakfast, you start the fun in again, and carry on for most of the day, with only a quick break at lunchtime.

By late Saturday afternoon, even you are ready for a break. None of you have had a stitch of clothes on or gone out of the Cabin since shortly after you arrived.

You sit on one end of the living room couch, with your arms around June and Michelle, who are cuddled up on either side of you, quietly dozing. Liz and Bridget are at the other end of the couch, passionately tongue-kissing. Gwen is sprawled on the rug in front of you, gasping contentedly as Olivia diligently eats her out. Sharon is stretched out in an easy chair on the other side of the room. Catherine is sitting in her lap, with her head resting on Sharon's chest. Both women are fast asleep. The two older women have really impressed you. If you've learned nothing else, you've learned that experience can count for alot. Imagine if the two of them had the benefits of experience, but were as young as their daughters! If they were young again, but as "knowledgeable" as they are now! The thought really sticks in your mind, and as you think about it, you begin to feel that familiar tingling in your brain, and Sharon and Catherine blur even as the broken vase and plate had! When the blurring clears, they are still sleeping peacefully but they now look no older than June or Liz!

Nudging June and Michelle awake, you take them over to look at Sharon and Catherine, first commanding the others to stay as they are. Liz and Bridget stretch out to take up the entire couch, but Olivia doesn't even look up from Gwen's vagina. June and Michelle are stunned as you explain to them what happened. You gently wake them up, and take them in to stand in front of the bathroom mirror. They gasp at their reflections even as you explain to them what happened. You take a good look at them yourself. Sharon could almost be Liz's twin. Catherine, on the other hand, resembles June, but not so closely. You've heard June say that she was alwayd told she took after her father's side of the family. You lead the foursome out into the kitchen, avoiding the living room where Liz and Bridget are making out on the couch and Olivia is still determinedly servicing Gwen on the rug. Even as you sit down at the kitchen table, you hear a knock at the front door. You cannot imagine who it is - as far as you know, there was no one around up here.

You decide to...
11511112.title: "I'm not sure. Give me a few days to th...

choices: ...you want to live a quiet life.
115111121.content:
You decide to see who is at the door. You reach out with your mind, and while you can sense a presence outside, you find that you cannot enter their mind or take control of it. Even as you touch the other mind, you find it entering yours! June, Michelle, Sharon and Catherine slump over asleep at the table, as though someone had flicked a off switch. Suddenly you find yourself standing up. Your clothing vanishes from where you had strewn it it on the floor the night before and rematerializes on your body. Now fully dressed, you find yourself walking towards the door. Now you know what it is like to be controlled! You open the door. Standing there is a middle-aged woman. She seems familiar, even though you're fairly certain that you've never seen her before.

"Hello, Jamie", she says, "I'm your parent."

You cannot speak, but your mind reels with shock. "'My parent'?", you think. "What is she talking about? Does she mean she is my biological mother?"

"In a manner of speaking, I am", she says, answering the unspoken thought. "Come on outside, we'll talk."

You follow her obediently. You walk to a large rock by the side of the lake, and sit down beside her on it.

"You're going to find alot of this difficult to believe, although maybe not so difficult as you would have a few days ago. I am your 'biological' parent. I am not, however, human , and neither are you."

You find that you can now speak.

"You mean we're aliens?"

"'Aliens' is too small a term", she says. "We're not simply from another planet. We're from a race of beings that exist on another level of reality than this world. However. we once were creatures much like humanity. I know that in biology class, you've heard of what humans call 'embryonic recapitulation theory' - the notion that the human fetus recapitulates all the stages of human evolution as it develops. As it turns out, it's not true for humans. However, it is true for our kind. When one of us reproduces, we must find a world that supports the kind of life form we once were and place our offspring there as one of the life forms native to that place. The world we choose serves as a sort of a combination womb and cradle for the offspring while it develops. It lives there for many years as one of the natives of that world. Eventually, however, it begins to develop various new abilities - like the ones you have been developing. When it has developed as much as it can on this level of reality, it transcends it and is 'born' into the greater reality that our people live in."

"You just drop your kids off on a planet, and leave them there? What if they get hurt?"

"Our offspring generate a low-level 'protective probabilty field' that protects them from any major harm. Think about it - you've never a serious injury or been seriously ill, have you? The field discreetly protects you from anything that might kill or cripple you, while allowing for minor injuries so that you don't manifest an 'invulnerability' that might draw unwanted attention to you. Once your powers develop to the point where nothing in this world can harm you, the field fades."

"But what if something really catastrophic happens while I'm still young? What if someone nukes my town, or something?"

"Oh, we scan a world's timeline before we drop an offspring off in it, to make sure nothing bad is scheduled to happen while the offspring is there."

"You can see through time?"

"Yes, or rather, we see 'time' from outside. It's hard to explain to someone who's still living in time. You'll understand it someday."

"I notice you look like a woman, but you call yourself my 'parent'. Do I have a father somewhere?"

"No. Or rather, if you like, I am your 'mother' and your 'father'. We reproduce asexually." She tells you a little about the mechanics of reproduction for her - your- kind.

"Does that mean I can't have children by a human woman?"

"Oh, no, you can have as many human children as you like. For that matter, once you master shape-shifting, you can even bear children yourself, if you want. But they'll just be human, not a mixture of our race and theirs. They - and any descendants they have - will be be free of any genetic weaknesses or hereditary diseases or things like that."

You think about this a little.

"'Shape-shifting'? I'll be able to do that?"

"Yes, and fairly soon, I should think. Already you probably can do things you haven't thought of yet. For example, look at that squirrel over there." She points at a grey squirrel on a nearby tree branch.

"What about it?"

"Concentrate on it, and imagine a copy of that squirrel appearing right next to it."

You do as she says. there's a tingling in your brain, and sure enough, a second squirrel, the same as the first, appears right next to it.

"Now", she says, "maybe you don't think the world doesn't need another grey squirrel just now. Look at it, and this time, imagine the duplicate turning into a red squirrel."

Again you do as she says, and the second squirrel turns from grey to red.

"Just how far are my powers going to develop?"

"A great deal, even while you're living here. Although what you will be able to do here, is only the smallest fraction of what you'll be able to do once you emerge into the 'real' world. Bear in mind, though - even we are not all-powerful We're not gods."

A thought occurs to you.

"Why are you here right now?"

"Well, ordinarily, we don't interfere directly with an offspring as young as you. However, your powers developed much sooner than is normal. My - "pediatrician" is the nearest term you would know - thinks that June's experiment did it. Extraordinary, really, that something an ephemeral could do could effect one of us, but that seems to be the most likely thing. As I say, we're not gods, and we don't know everything. But, really, your powerss weren't meant to develop for several dozen years yet, when you would have matured some and been better prepared to handle them."

"So, what are you going to do?"

"Oh, nothing, really. Is just came here to check up on you, offer a little reassurance, and so on."

"Oh. I thought maybe you were here because I was misusing my powers, or something."

"Why, because of what you were doing with the human females? Oh, good heavens, no! We expect our offspring to make use of the ephemerals we set them down amongst, that's only natural. And anyway, you can hardly be blamed for 'misusing' powers that you were totally unprepared for, or for engaging in the sort of behavior common to the adolescent human male that you thought you were. I daresay that most guys your age, suddenly given powers like yours, would use them to secure mating partners. And anyway, you're still effectively a child in the womb to us. Criticizing your behavior here would be a little like criticizing a fetus for having poor table manners. So long as you don't do anything that indicates a severe developmental problem or is really self-destructive, like slaughtering all the humans or something comparable, we leave you to your own devices."

A question has occurred to you. "You say you set me down on this world. Are there other 'offspring' on nearby worlds? Am I going to be meeting other people like me?"

"Oh! I'm sorry! Terminology trouble. When I say 'this world', I don't just mean 'this planet'. I mean 'this universe'.

You sit there, your mind suitably boggled. For some reason, it doesn't occur to you to doubt anything she has said. It somehow just feels true.

"I'm going to be the most powerful being in this universe?"

"One day you will. And one day, this universe will seem smaller to you than the cradle that your human mother rocked you in when you were an infant."

She stands and smiles at you.

"I have to go now. I have confidence that you will be well."

"Will I ever see you again?"

"Not in this world", she says, "not unless something goes spectacularly wrong. Otherwise, we'll meet again once you are 'born'."

With that, she vanishes. You go back into the Cabin. Liz and Bridget are asleep on the couch, with a blanket over them. Gwen is stretched out on the rug, with Olivia snoring softly into her crotch. A pillow is under Gwen's head, and Olivia is covered by a blanket. You suspect your parent's hand in this. Your suspicions are confirmed when see that the kitchen table is empty. You look into the bedrooms. Sharon and Catherine are asleep in one bed, and June and Michelle are asleep in the other. You decide to have a nap before supper, and crawl into the bed between the latter two. You doze off quickly. When you awaken an hour later, you sit and think about what you've learned. June's earlier question about what you wanted to do with your life has taken. on a whole new dimension. Eventually, you decide...
115111121.title: Find out who it is.

1151111212.content:
You decide that you want to make some pretty drastic changes, though you know it may take a little time to implement them all. You rouse the others and have some supper. With nine of you, supper is easily made. After a good meal, you find yourself getting horny once again. You look at Sharon and Catherine, and remember why you "rejuvenated" them in the first place. You lead them into one of the bedrooms, leaving the others to enjoy one another's company. You put your "old minds in young bodies" theory to the test, and it proves true as you enjoy a vigorous threesome with them.

Afterwards, you decide that you've really enjoyed having your own little "harem" over the weekend and you don't want to give that up. However, you know that even with your new powers, it might be problematical to show up back home with teenaged versions of them. You also find that you've started to feel a little possessive about Sharon. You don't especially want to go on "sharing" her with George, but it would be unfair to him to just take his wife away from him. Suddenly you think of your parent and her demonstration with the squirrels. Maybe she foresaw this dilemma, and was hinting at a solution. You stand up, and have Sharon and Catherine sit up on the bed, leaving space between them. You focus on them both, your brain tingles, and then suddnely, there are four women on the bed - teenaged and middle aged versions of Sharon and Catherine! You decide to think of "your", younger Sharon and Catherine as "Sharon 1.0" and "Catherine 1.0", and the older versions as "Sharon 2.0" and "Catherine 2.0". You discuss the practicalities of the situation with them, and what you want to do in the future. Then you bring them out to see the others and discuss your plans with them. Your ultimate goal is to set yourself up somewhere that you can live with your "girls", but you know that it will take a little time to accomplish. For now, you're going to go back to your lives, while you work out the details. June asks how you're going to explain the teenaged versions of your mothers. You explain that they're going to be distant younger cousins of their respective duplicates, who happen to have the same names as them, and who are coming to stay with you for awhile. You admit that the idea would never work ordinarily, but with your expanding powers, it should be doable.

You enjoy the rest of the weekend, and then head back home Sunday afternoon. At home, you "give" Sharon 2.0 back to George, and set Sharon 1.0 up in the basement, for now. You think about making space for her. As it happens, Butch is in the living room with his girlfriend, Connie. Butch has often tried to convince her to share an apartment with him, but she's always been a bit commitment-shy. You decide to do him a favor and free up a room in the house. You enter Connie's mind.


You love Butch with all your heart, and want nothing more than to spend the rest of your life with him. You will happily move in with him as soon as possible.

You smile as she suddenly begins begging Butch to live with her. Later that night, you reach through her mind when she's telling her parents about it, to make sure that they are compliant. You take Michelle to bed with you that night, reflecting on how quickly the bizarre has come to seem "normal" to you. In the morning, Michelle blows you awake. You kiss your little "human alarm clock" afffectionately. and send her off to get ready for school, before doing so yourself.


In homeroom, you sit with June and note that Dane is continuing to look sharp. You decide to fix him up with a girlfriend. You look into his mind, and see that he's always been attracted to Janet Noonan, a mousy, uptight little blonde girl. You nudge her mind and she comes over to talk to him. You are confident that love will soon bloom, there. At lunch, you see that Billy and Veronica are sitting together, looking dreamily into one another's eyes. You note with amusement that Veronica is wearing Billy's TARDIS pin.

The school days go by. You amuse yourself by using the supply room to "sample" various female classmates and teachers, as well as spend quality time with your "harem". One day you eliminate bullying from the school with a thought: Be nice to each other. Another day, you prompt a sapphic romance between the head cheerleader, Lisa Spencer, and Goth loner Jennie Thomas. You find your schoolwork easier - not because you can cheat by reading minds, but because you find it easier to absorb information. You suppose it must be a new development of your powers. After a month goes by, Butch moves out to live with Connie. You move Sharon 1.0 into his old room. Eventually, the end of the school year comes, as does your eighteenth birthday, and you feel the time has come for you to make your move. Wwith June's assistance, you arrange to manipulate the local lottery drawing. You wait until the jackpot is quite high, then arrange for George to win it. You have him sign the Cabin over to you, along with a good chunk of the money, and his advice on how best to invest it. You arrange to quietly marry June. Ssince she is a minor, you have to obtain Catherine's written consent, which is easily enough done. You have a quick civil ceremony - you have no desire for a huge wedding. You gather all of your things in a rental van., and you, June, Sharon 1.0 and Catherine 2.0 take off for your new home.

You have a nice little honeymoon there, and then decide to gather the rest of your "girls". You realize that removing all five of them from their normal lives might cause more disruption than you would prefer, so you decide to create duplicates of them as you did with Sharon and Catherine. The next weekend you go home and pick them all up, leaving duplicates of them all in their places. You also take duplicates of all the tings they want to take with them as well.

When you get them back to the Cabin, you realize that it's a bit cramped to be permanent quarters for all of you. You use your burgeoning powers to add some extra rooms onto the building. With Sharon's advice, you arrange for the appropriate permits to be granted. You furnish the rooms by mentally duplicating items that the girls request. You realize that you won't actually need to spend much money, since you can duplicate anything you need, and the few bills you have to pay won't amount to much. Time goes by and you all settle in. After a few months, you discover that while you are enjoying a life of regular fornication, you realize that you'd like to do a little something more. You decide to...
1151111212.title: ...you want to make drastic changes.

choices: ...meander around the country for a bit.
11511112122.content:
You decide it would be fun to travel somewhere. You think about where you'd like to go. On the one hand, you'd always thought that you'd like to drive across country. On the other hand, you know that June has always wanted to go to Japan, and you wouldn't mind doing that yourself. It occurs to you that there's no reason you couldn't do both! You start to think about the logistics of it. You can easily produce a car for yourself with your powers, and keep it in gassed up and in good repair. Getting hotel rooms shouldn't be a bother - for that matter, you could just have people put you up in their houses, if you wanted to! You also think about who you want to bring with you. You don't really want to bring all eight of your girls along, at least not on this trip!

An idea strikes you - you call June and Michelle into the room where you are and explain your plan. The three of you will be a family! You use your powers to make yourself and June outwardly look in your middle 30's and to make Michelle look around 10 and a little more as though she could be the offspring of you and June. You call the others in to see. Catherine 1.0 jokes, "So, I've got a grand-daughter already!"

Before you can restore yourselves to your proper appearances, you sense the presence of other minds outside. This concerns you because the Cabin is in a fairly remote place - people don't typically just drive by randomly all that often. You scan the outsiders' minds - it's a carload of four would-be thieves who heard about your lottery win and decided to rob you, and who are casing your home for a burglary. This makes you very angry - you could just take over their minds and send them on their way, but you decide instead to have a little "fun" with them instead. You focus your mind on their car, and turn it to dust while they are still sitting in it. You smirk as they tumble to the ground, yelling in alarm. Then you summon them into the house. What to do, what to do? Suddenly, you have an inspiration - you're going to make these low-lifes your bitches, literally! You concentrate on the foursome, they blur, and soon they transform into four fine young female German Shepherds! You program their minds to be fiercely loyal and protective to you and your "harem". The girls are soon cooing over their new pets, as your materialize collars and license tags around the dogs' necks. They are fine-looking dogs, you think. Perhaps sometime you'll find some eager male Shepherds and breed them. You whip up some leashes and lead the dogs into the back yard. You whip up some doghouses for them, along with some water dishes and some dog food.

You can't help but think, though. If you did take off with June and Michelle, you'd want the other girls to be safe. You return yourself, June and Michelle to normal, then gather everyone in the living room. You gather your thoughts together and focus on generating a personal protective around each of them, just as your parent said you had. Your brain tingles, the girls blur, and then - they still look the same, but you can somehow "see" invisible fields around them. You know that they are now as safe as you can make them.

You think some more about your plans to travel - it occurs to you that if you occupy people's minds from time to time as you go, you should be able to create a mental relay network that should enable you to reach across the country. Across the Pacific might be another matter, even though your powers are continuing to develop. It also occurs to you that you don't really need to bring any luggage - you can use your powers to create anything you need. You decide you'll bring a suitcase each, just so as not to attract attention. One final thought occurs to you - no one needs to know that you're not there at all! You just have to make a few changes....

The next morning, you whip up a (properly-licensed) car and load your bags into it. Your alter your appearance, as well as June's and Michelle's. You've stocked up the house with food for the remaining humans and the dogs as well. You've also procured a cellphone for yourselves, in case you need to be contacted non-mentally. When everything else is ready, you carry out the "changes" you thought of the night before. You summon the others to the living room. With your powers, you transform Catherine 1.0 into a duplicate of June's normal form, then you transform Sharon 1.0 into a duplicate of your natural form! You give them both the information they'll need to pose as the pair of you. You encourage Sharon to "explore" being male all she wants with the others while you're gone - just so long as she's careful not to get any of them pregnant!


You hit the road, driving west. By about supper time, you've made it as far as Ohio. You stop in at a local diner for a bite to eat. Sitting alone at the table next to yours is a pretty young brown-haired woman in a wheelchair. She looks vaguely familiar, and Michelle seems to recognize her, too, so you strike up a conversation with her. She introduces herself as Rose Dupont. The name sounds familiar, but before you can speak, Michelle interjects.

"The Rose Dupont? The dancer?"

Rose nods in assent. You remember now. Rose Dupont was an up-and-coming young dancer a few years ago - right around the time Michelle had started dance classes. She'd seemed to have bright future ahead of her, until a drunk driver had hit her car one night, and she'd lost the use of her legs. Michelle spoke again.

"I remember reading about your accident. It was so sad!"

"Really?" said Rose. "That was five years ago. You must have been quite young."

"Uh...yeah", said Michelle, remembering that she looked about five years younger than she actually was. "I was."

"Michelle learned to read quite young", you explain. "She was something of a prodigy."

Michelle spoke again.

"It must be so hard for you, not to be able to dance." She caught herself, suddenly realizing that she might sound a little tactless. "Sorry, I..."

Rose smiled at her sadly.

"It's OK. You're right, it is hard. I'd give anything to be able to dance again, even just one more time. But I get by. I got a fair amount of money in the settlement, and I keep busy teaching dance at the local high school."

You look at Michelle and June, and they nod at you. You reach into Rose's mind, and prompt her to invite you all to spend the night at her house.

After you finish your meals, you follow her to a small, one story home nearby. You all sit down in her living room, and you all stare at her.

"What's up? Why are you all staring at me?" she asks. You reach out with your powers, healing her damaged spine, and restoring her atrophied legs to what they once were.

"W-what's happening to me?" she says in a quavering voice. "I - I can feel my legs. I can feel my legs!"


Dance for us, Rose, you think at her.

With a look of wordless awe on her face she rises from her wheelchair and begins to dance - so gracefully, it's like nothing you've ever seen before in your life. You think about how beautiful she is, and with a thought you cause her clothing to disperse and instantly she is dancing naked for you all. She is so beautiful that you forget to be aroused for awhile. Eventually you remember, and you take her in your arms and kiss her gently. You leave June and Michelle to amuse themselves, and guide her into her bedroom, Soon, the pair of you are "dancing in the sheets", and you discover to your amazement, that she is just as graceful there.

Later, you lie awake and think about what to do. Your original idea was to simply give Rose her requested chance to dance one more time and then return her to the way she was, leaving it as a pleasant memory, a vivid dream that seemed so real. But having seen her dance, you haven't the heart to return her to the way she was before. No, you'll leave her "cured" - it'll just have to be an unexplained "miracle" that her legs were restored. You think again of how graceful she was - you almost think of adding her to your "harem", but it occurs to you that you can duplicate her anytime if you want to. The next morning, you induce her to sleep late. While she is sleeping, you gather yourselves to leave. You reach into her sleeping mind, and remove all memories of your activities of the night before. She will just remember you as a nice family that she met at the diner before going home alone. Before you go, you reach out and similarly cloud the memories of any of her neighbors who might have seen you go into her house. As an afterthought, you place a personal protective field around her - it would be an awful joke if, in her exuberance when she discovered that she could walk again, she got into some kind of an accident! Later, when you're a distance from her home, you reach into her mind and rouse her from her sleep. You watch through her mind - and you allow June and Michelle to watch, too - Rose's shock, wonder, and then joy as she realizes that her legs are somehow - inexplicably, miraculously - working again!


You continue driving west, thinking. Do you want to head straight for the West Coast (there to hop a plane to Japan), or do you want to meander around the country for a bit? You decide to...
11511112122.title: ...travel around the world.

choices: ...head straight to Japan. You can visit Hawaii another time.
115111121221.content:
You continue to drive across country, enjoying being a "family" with your wife and "daughter". You take in the sights, and occasionally sample the local beauties. You try a few other things as well. In Saint Louis one morning, your waitress has trouble getting you breakfast order right, so you increase her IQ to genius levels. At another stop, you overhear two people conversing in Spanish. You experiment and find that you can copy their knowledge of Spanish into your own mind, as well as those of June and Michelle. Soon the three of you are chattering away happily in Spanish as well as English. As you travel, you listen to the radio reports of Rose's "miraculous" recovery. You chuckle listening to various doctors proposing various reasons why she can walk again.

At the Grand Canyon, you stuck in line behind an obnoxious tourist family, a middle-aged couple and their sullen teenaged son. You grow so weary of their constant complaining that you turn the three of them into mules and ride them on the Canyon tour. It is only the next day, when you are hundreds of miles away, that you realize that you were so distracted by the Canyon's beauty that you forgot to transform them back again afterwards. Oh, well, you'll have to try to remember to change them back again if you're ever back that way. Who knows? Maybe they're better off. You do wonder what the tour guides thought when they realized they had three extra mules at the end of the day!

Eventually you reach Los Angeles. You decide to take at look at Hollywood while you're there. Michelle asks to see the studio where they film her favorite sitcom, the imaginatively-named Three Sisters. It's easy enough for you to gain access to the studio, and the guard informs you that you are in luck - the three stars of the show, Tara Wilshire, Mary Davis and Janet Leung, are at the studio today. You quickly arrange to meet them. When you do get to see them, it occurs to you that they are all pretty attractive. The perverse part of your imagination kicks in a bit. You know the trouble TV shows have when one of a show's starts gets pregnant. What would happen if all three got pregnant at the same time? You scan the three actresses, they are all clean and healthy, and you tweak them to make sure they are all fertile and certain to become pregnant when you have your way with them. You quickly arrange for the six of you to have some "private time" in Tara's dressing room. You have an even more perverse thought and decide to let June and Michelle in on the fun. Once you are all alone, you return the three of you to your normal forms. You then alter June and Michelle so that they both have fully functional male organs. You ask Michele who her favorite of the three is, and she chooses Tara. June picks Mary, and you are happy enough to be left with Janet. Soon, you, your wife and your sister are happily fucking the three actresses. When it is done, you return yourself, June and Michelle to your "tourist" forms. You alter the memories of the actresses and everyone else in the studio so that they don't remember your visit. You also blank out all surveillance records for the day. You further alter the actresses' minds so that when the time comes, they will be determined to keep their babies, and be the best possible mothers they can. You plant suggestions that they will go out and party hearty tonight, and in the morning, have unclear memories of one night stands with guys they don't remember, so that they will have some cause that they can tie the pregnancies to when they become aware of them.

You decide that if you are going to Japan, you should learn the language. You go over the the Japanese Consulate in LA, and pick up a thorough knowledge of the language for yourself and your girls.


In your room that night, you think about your visit to the studio. As an experiment, you alter yourself so that you have a vagina, June so that she has a penis again, and let her fuck you. It's like nothing you've ever felt before, and not easy to compare to the male experience of sex. June seems to feel the same way. In the morning, you have Michelle eat you out, just so you can see what oral feels like for a woman. You return yourselves all to your "tourist" forms, and head to the airport. When you get there, you disperse your car, knowing that you can recreate it whenever you like. You board a plane for Tokyo. You know that it will be stopping in Hawaii to re-fuel. Hawaii sounds like an interesting place. You think about whether you want to visit there a little before heading on to Japan. You decide to...
115111121221.title: ...head straight for the West Coast.

1151111212212.content:
You decide that while Hawaii certainly looks interesting, you will stick to your original plan and go straight on to Tokyo. You arrive at Narita Airport in Tokyo at about 8:00 a.m. local. time. You use your powers to refresh yourself, June and Michelle, so that you don't suffer from jetlag. With your powers, you are able to breeze through customs. You call home to check how things are going. Sharon 1.0 answers (it is odd hearing her speak in "your" voice) and tells you that all is well there.

You look around the airport for awhile, and then take a train into Tokyo Station. You look around the station, and think that use could use a guide. You look around and see a likely candidate - a cute girl sitting in a coffee shop, looking at a book. You scan her mind. Her name is Ishikawa Noriko. She's 18, single, just out of high school, and living with her parents while she (so far with no success) looks for a job.

You take over Noriko's mind and have her guide you to the Tokyo Station Hotel, where you book a room. Then the four of you spend the day touring the city, taking in the Imperial Palace, Tokyo Tower and many other sights. Later you go back to Noriko's home, and meet her family, including her parents, Ichiro and Emiko, genial people in their early 50's, her older sister, Hiroko, 25, who lives at home while working in an office, and her younger brother, Hiroshi, 15, who is still in school. You enter their minds so as to make them quiescent of the fact that you'll be "borrowing" Noriko for awhile. You then take Noriko back to your hotel room with you. You take her to bed and have your way with her while June and Michelle bathe.

Afterwards, an idea occurs to you - you decide it would be fun to have a "girls' night out". You decide it would be less conspicuous if you all looked Japanese. June and Noriko already do, so you simply alter them so they both look about 25 years old, then alter yourself and Michelle so that you both look like 25 year old Japanese girls as well. This is the first time you've ever made yourself completely female, and it takes a little getting used to. The others have to coach you a little on how to "act like a girl" and help you choose appropriate clothes to wear. You look at yourself in the mirror, and decide you make a cute Japanese girl. The four of you go out to dinner, and then hit some nightspots. You have a fun night out - you find yourself and your friends getting hit on by guys. You even find yourself thinking some of them are "cute"! This kind of weirds you out a little, but it also gives you ideas.

The four of you go back to your hotel room. You remain in female form, while turning June, Michelle and Noriko into male versions of their normal selves. You find June-as-a-guy particularly hot, so you let her/him fuck you silly. Afterwards, you blow Michelle and Noriko just to see what that's like. Afterwards, you revert June, Michelle and yourself to your "tourist" forms, and Noriko to normal. You spend about a month touring around Japan, seeing the sights, and trying out all sorts of sexual combinations, both with your companions and with various local men and women. Eventually, you reach the point where you start getting homesick. You all go back to Noriko's parents' home. You can tell that Noriko's mother and sister have been arguing about something. You ask Noriko what it's all about.

"Oh, it's the usual thing", she says. "Mom's afraid Hiroko is going to live at home forever. She wants her to marry her boyfriend and start pumping out grandchildren."

You have Hiroko introduce you to her boyfriend, Hideki. He seems like a decent enough sort, and he obviously adores Hiroko. You alter their minds so that they will be eager to marry and start a family. You assure Noriko that her mother will soon have lots of grandchildren. You realize that you've become quite fond of Noriko. You decide to take her home with you as a "living souvenir". You create a Noriko 2.0 to take her place at home, then alter Noriko 1.0 so that she looks about seven years old, and could be the daughter of June and yourself.

You fly back home, landing in Los Angeles. When you get there, you give Noriko an an ability to speak the English language equal to your own. You scan for and detect Tara, Mary and Janet's minds. Mary is already aware that she is pregnant but hasn't told anyone, Tara suspects but isn't sure, and Janet doesn't know at all yet.

You drive halfway across the country before you realize that you've forgotten the mule people again. Maybe next time, you think.

In Saint Louis, you check up on the waitress whose IQ you increased. She is still working at the diner, but is going to school nights, studying advanced mathematics.

When you get to Ohio, you visit Rose again. You remember the visit you had with her, and decide to take her home with you as well, leaving a Rose 2.0 to take her place. You turn Rose 1.0 into a five year old "little sister" for Michelle and Noriko. When you arrive home, you return everyone to their normal forms, and introduce the others to Rose and Noriko. You all have a huge orgy to celebrate your homecoming. The next day, you add some new rooms to the house for them. After you'd had some time to relax at home, you think about what to do next. You decide to...
1151111212212.title: ...head straight to Japan. You can visit Hawaii...

choices: ...go check up on your old friends back home.
11511112122122.content:
You enjoy spending time at home. You explore the neighborhood around the Cabin, going into the local town from time to time. You get to know Emma Clarke, a 16 year old girl who works as a clerk in the local convenience store. She's cute and funny with long blonde hair, but very short, only 4' 8" tall. You decide to have a little fun with her. You go into the store every Monday and increase her height by one inch. You also bolster her physique, bit by bit. At first, she seems to be pleased that she's no longer the tiniest one in any group, but when she passes 5' 6", she starts to wonder if she's ever going to stop growing. Also, she can't have new clothes, because she keeps outgrowing them! After four months, you stop her growth at six feet even. By this time, she's built like a huge, busty Amazon. You find her very impressive, and decide to take her into your "harem", leaving an Emma 2.0 in her place. While this was going on, you discovered a new aspect of your powers. You hear a news report that Clara Higgins, the waitress in Saint Louis whose IQ you increased, has published proofs of several mathematical theorems that had never been proven before. You wish you could go and see her again, and to your surprise, your vision blurs, and when it clears, you find yourself in the diner in Saint Louis where she works. Fortunately, no one seems to have witnessed your unorthodox "arrival". Clara spots you and immediately comes over to talk to you.

You", she says, "you're the one that did this to me, aren't you?"

"W-what?", you stammer.

"It wasn't hard to figure out. I remember that day very clearly - you seem to have given me a photographic memory as well. I was slow with your order, and you were exasperated. You gave me a look, and suddenly I could feel my mind expanding, like nothing I'd ever felt before. But by the time I'd connected the feeling to you, you were gone."

You decide to be honest with her. You prompt her boss to give her the rest of her shift off, then take her out for a walk to a local park. You tell her who you really are and the nature of your powers. You ask her what she's going to do with the information. She says she doesn't know, but that she feels like she has to do something. You freeze her in place while you think about the situation. The simplest thing to do would be to wipe her memory of you. She's kind of cute, though. Despite her family name, she's dark-haired and looks like some of the Puerto Rican girls you knew in school. You decide to take her into the "harem", too. You leave a Clara 2.0 in her place, altering her memory so that she doesn't remember you.

When you get home, you expand the Cabin with new rooms. You now have a "harem" of twelve girls. You test your teleporting power - you find that for now, at least, you can only teleport to places you've been before. One day you hear a news report about Tara, Mary and Janet - they've publicly acknowledged their pregnancies. You are fascinated to know that their show's producers have decide to write all three actresses' pregnancies into the show!

One day, when you are exploring the woods around the Cabin, you come across four young couples on horseback. You hear one of the women say:

"Don't you just love riding? I feel at one with my horse. I really wish I could be one with him, don't you?"

Hearing this, your perverse side kicks in. You use your powers to merge them with their mounts, effectively turning them into centaurs. You're feeling "merciful", so you shield their minds a bit so that the shock doesn't drive them insane, and you give them an instinctive knowledge of how to use their equine parts.You surround them with special protective fields - you know that it's inevitable that people will take an interest in what happened to them, but you shield them to at least the extent that they won't become objects of horror or end up prisoners in labs, somewhere. You think that it would be interesting to have a race of centaurs around, so you render them extremely long-lived and fertile.

All that done, you sit back and watch their astonished reactions to their transformations. As you expected, they became the center of world-wide attention for quite some time, before eventually settling back into their new lives. By this time, your powers have expanded such that you can reach any mind within a hundred mile radius. You broadcast a general command to treat them respectfully and treat them as neighbors. One thing you had not expected - by chance or design, the women that day had all been riding stallions and the men had all been riding mares, a fact which was brought home to them rather forcefully when the men's equine parts went into season! Soon, they are well on their way to becoming the fatherdams and mothersires of a somewhat oddly-gendered race of centaurs.

When the time comes for the three actresses to give birth, you arrange for yourself, June and Michelle to each secretly witness the births of your offspring. Each of you now has a baby daughter, even though you can't acknowledge it. You notice June and Michelle looking quite wistful afterwards. You ask them to explain, and they both say that it is because not only have they become "fathers" before they became mothers, they have children that they cannot acknowledge.You talk things over with them, and agree that it's time to start a family of your own.

While you love all of your girls, you are closest to June and Michelle, so you decide to start with them. Soon both of them are pregnant. The pregnancies go very smoothly - you assume that this is due to your powers - and in nine months, June gives birth to a daughter you name Sarah, and Michelle has a son you name Alexander, both perfectly healthy. You copy the local pediatrician's knowledge into all of your minds, so that the babies have parentsand ten loving "aunts":, who are all highly qualified to look after them. Parenthood is a thrill for you, and you don't have the monetary or space constraints that other parents have. The other girls begin to clamor for babies of their own, and over the next few years, you have children by all of them. You find an excellent pediatric nurse, and take her into your "household", producing several copies of her to help with the childcare chores.

When Sarah and Alexander are old enough to begin school, you go there on the first day and mentally "program" the entire student body, so that there will be no bullying or troublemaking in the school. You also make sure that noone questions your children about their unusual family life. You go back there every year to renew the command on any new students or teachers. Occasionally you will increase the IQs of some of the "slower" students, just to give them a hand. You are amused when the first centaur childfoal begins attending the school.

When the youngest of your twelve children starts school, you think about what to do next. You decide to...
11511112122122.title: ...start a family.

choices: ...try and see if time travle is possible.
115111121221222.content:
One day, you and June go home to visit your families, leaving the children at home with the other girls. Since you've used your powers to keep
yourself and your "harem" looking around 18 years old, whenever you go home, you "age" yourselves to look closer to your actual ages. By now, it's been ten years since you first moved away form home. You tried to stay in touch, but even with your powers, having twelve children around the house has kept you busy. You haven't been home near as often as you feel you should have.

For your first stop, you spend some time with Catherine 2.0. She's taken up with Howard, a middle-aged widower. You check him out - he seems like a nice enough guy, but you use your powers to ensure that he always treats her right. June doesn't mind if her mother re-marries, so you put that thought into their heads, decide to let whatever happens happen.

Next you go to visit George and Sharon 2.0, who are suffering a bit from "empty nest syndrome", since both Liz 2.0 and Michelle 2.0 have both
moved out by this point. You have a pleasant time visiting with them, confessing to them that since you have had children of your own, you
understand better how much effort they made for you. You use your powers to make sure that they are both in good health.

Next you visit Butch, who is living across town. He and Connie have been married for some time now, and have a six year old daughter. Butch is
working as a mechanic for a local garage, and Connie works at a local daycare center. You have a good time talking to Butch, realizing that you
both have matured some since the old days when he used to torment one another.

You have to catch up with Liz 2.0 on the fly - still unmarried, she puts all her energy into her job as a realtor - it turns out that she has a real
talent for selling real estate. You "persuade" her to take a break long enough to go to lunch with you. At the restaurant, you meet up with Bridget
2.0, who is also still single and is teaching at your old elementary school.

For dinner that night, you meet up with Dane and Janet. Dane has changed alot! Now he's an up-and-coming young lawyer - he's been married to Janet for five years, and they have a son and a daughter. you find it funny to see Dane as "Mister Establishment", with Janet as his perfect little housewife. You're glad to se ethemboth doing well

The next day, you catch up with Olivia 2.0 and Gwen 2.0 - they both have jobs working for a local research lab. To your surprise, they're married -
to each other! You realize that Olivia's interest in Gwen's vagina wasn't solely due to your powers! They are still in touch with Lisa and Jennie,
who are also a married couple and have become ardent gay rights activists. You feel a little sheepish about that - you hadn't meant for them to be a permanent thing, only a brief fling to scandalize the school. Oh, well, you think, at least it seems to have worked out well. They also tell you about Billy and Veronica, who got married right out of high school and have several children. You're glad that your meddling in these people's lives hasn't had any disastrous consequences.

You sense something is troubling them - you scan their minds and see that they would like to have a child of their own, but that they're afraid that they might have trouble adopting, even in this day and age. You smirk, thinking that you have a solution to their situation. You temporarily "equip" Olivia 2.0 so that she can impregnate Gwen 2.0, and then return to normal once this is done. You check back on them a few weeks later and see that they are on their way to haivng a child of their own.

You spend the night at your parents' house, and then fly up to Boston to visit Michelle 2.0, who is doing graduate work at MIT. She is very pleased to see you, and you have a good time visiting with her. You think about the life you might have had if you'd been a "normal" person, but you know that you can't go back to being "normal".

Over the next few years, you have several more children by various members of your "harem" , and even occasionally "equip" some of them to have children by each other. You intersperse these activities with vacations all over the world, sometimes leaving behind offspring in other parts of the world. As time goes by, your oldest children reach adulthood, and start marrying and having children of their own.

Eventually, you remember what your parent said about bearing children of your own, and you decide to give it a try. You turn yourself into a woman and June into a man, and allow her to impregnate you. Pregnancy is like nothing you've ever experienced - even with your powers, it leaves you with a new appreciation of what your women have gone through for you. Over the next several years you allow each of them to "father" children on you.

All while this is occurring, you find the range of your powers expanding. By the time you are forty, you find that you can affect all minds within a thousand mile radius of you. On your trips around the world, you being doing some "social engineering", commanding everyone within the radius of your powers to be honest and unselfish and compassionate. The world begins to change severely - people begin working together to solve the world's problems. You do your p[art, too - using your powers to clean up especially polluted places or to cure some exceptionally nasty diseases - but you are surprised how little you have to do once people start actually working together. You can't help feeling bad that people could only achieve all this by being made to do it.

Of course, you indulge your impish side as well - creating a race of goat-folk from inhabitants of a town in the Rocky Mountains and a race of bird-people in Japan. Once the oceans are cleaned up, you even create a race of mer-folk off the coast of Hawaii. By the time you're 60, your powers have reached the point where you can control everyone on Earth. You start thinking about what to do next. Your oldest children are approaching middle age. You've made yourself and ther twelve members of your harem immortal, but you've decided to let your children live out normal human lives, as painful as it will be to lose them someday. At any rate, they'll all live a long time, and you could always duplicate them if you decide to.

The Earth is now a peaceful place. You're pretty much open now that you are the effective ruler of the world - there's no one that is not under your control. Somweimtes you misse having people that will argue with you. You've increased all of your girls' intelligence levels - without you realizing it, your own has increased a great deal, and they are the only ones you really feel that you can talk freely with. You start thinking about what you want to do next. You could start humanity moving out into space. On the other hand, you remember your parent once talking about existing outside of time. Could you possibly do time travel? You decide to...
115111121221222.title: ...go check up on your old friends back home.

1151111212212221.content:
As time goes by, and your powers continue to grow, you decide to assume open leadership of the human race. You turn the Cabin into a Castle, the new capital of the World. You declare yourself the High King of the Earth, and divide the Earth into twelve zones, and set up your girls as the Queens of the Earth.

You've already made them all immortal, so you render them all invulnerable to harm, with genius level intelligence, and telepathic and teleportational abilities. Anyone of them could probably control humanity by themselves, but their powers are still not as great as yours. As far as you could tell, you wouldn't be able to give them powers equal to or greater than your own.

Once you've established your rule over the Earth, you decide to begin settling the Solar System. With your powers and the cooperation of all humanity, it is relatively easy to set up permanent bases on the Moon. You and June have the first child conceived and born on the Moon. As the years go by, your powers grow to the point where you are capable of unaided space travel. You scan Mars and Venus in person, and determine that there is no intelligent life on either world. You use your powers to change both worlds so they are fit for human habitation. You stock the worlds with suitable life from Earth, and encourage human settlement.

Years go by, and you encourage human exploration of the other worlds of the Solar System. Eventually, you cease to think of yourself as being one of the humans. You are more like the Guardian of Humanity and your girls are your Shining Angels. Only your parent's long ago warning that you are not a god keeps you from claiming the title.

In time, humanity has thoroughly settled the Solar System, and you begin looking to the stars. You and your girls move from world to world as easily as you once moved from room to room. Your descendants are now so numerous that most of humanity is descended from you. You guide humanity out to the stars. Sometimes you find habitable worlds which are soon settled, or other worlds which you soon terraform.

Eventually you find alien races, who you easily control and compel to live in harmony with humanity. As eons pass, you come to control the entire Milky Way Galaxy. Your girls are now as far beyond humanty as humans are beyond ants, and you are much farther than them. You reach beyond your Galaxy, into the wider universe. As your parent told you so long ago, there is nothing that can withstand you. You think about what to do next - do you want to -
1151111212212221.title: ...start moving out into space.

11511112122122211.content:
Eventually you all pass beyond mere physical form, assuming it only when it pleases you . More years pass, and you find the universe itself beginning to seem small to you. You feel as though you are on the verge of something and you realize that the time is approaching for you to be born into the greater reality that your parent told you of.

You gather your Harem to you, from the ends of the universe. You all take human form on an Earth-like planet far from home. You all sit down, looking like a group of young people on a picnic and for the first time you tell them everything about who you are and what you are about to become.

They have numerous questions, but you restrain them. Before you can move on, you have to face the one thing that you have never done, the one thing that you are afraid of - facing up to what you've done to them over the years, the way you've used them, the way you've raped them physically and mentally, keeping them as what? Toys? Slaves? Favored pets? You know on some level that before you move on, you have to deal with what you've done here. For the first time since you gained your powers, you withdraw your control. For the first time in many years, they are free, with a full knowledge of what you have done to them. They all look at you, each differently. June's eyes are cold, calculating. Catherine looks stunned. Liz's eyes show the beginnings of a towering anger. Michelle's face reflects betrayal, disappointment, She begins to weep silently, which is worse for you than Liz's anger.You're about to speak when she lashes out at you with all the power you've given her. She can't hurt you, but you allow yourself to feel the pain. Eventually Michelle and Sharon restrain her, and she breaks down, weeping angrily.
